description: This full colour, 2-sided map contains everything you need to make the most of your trip to Banff National Park. Relief-shading shows topography, and it includes major hiking trails, all campgrounds, various points of interest, picnic areas, plus information on local history, geology and wildlife. The map covers Jasper National Park and the Columbia Icefield through to the town of Banff and Kananaskis Country. It also includes Kootenay and Yoho National Parks and Mount Assiniboine Provincial Park.
name: Gem Trek Publishing Banff National Park
